title: Ashes archive: Burns bowled first ball of series by Starc
text:
Opener Rory Burns is bowled first ball by Mitchell Starc to get England's 2021-22 Ashes off to a "shattering start" at the Gabba in Brisbane.

WATCH MORE: Stokes takes diving catch to dismiss Head

Listen to ball-by-ball commentary from the Ashes on BBC Sounds and watch the best of the action on the BBC Sport app and BBC iPlayer.

Available to UK users only.
summary: Opener Rory Burns is bowled first ball by Mitchell Starc to get England's 2021-22 Ashes off to a "shattering start" at the Gabba in Brisbane.
